channel.title: How do u change ur max skill?
channel.description: how do u change ur max skill if u dont noe wat i mean i will tell u Wen u train and u get very high ur skills are 135 and then they are maxed i wana change the 135 to like 300 but i dont noe how :( :( :( :( i wna change cause once im maxed my skill goes down by 1 evry min so plz help me :( :( :( :([br][size=1]Posted at: August 02, 2006, 10:05:36 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know wat to do cause i need help. ty for trying if u are tryin??[br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 10:08:17 AM[/size][hr][size=30pt]Y ppl don't reply i need help!!!![/size]

item.title: How do u change ur max skill?
item.dc:creator: @alysonj9 alysonj9
item.description:
@alysonj9 wrote:

Ok il tell you how, Well if you really want to do this it will change it for the whole server everyone can train up to that point.

first open client.java and search

    public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

then somewere you will see your max stat for example here is what mine looks like

[code] }

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 125; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 125;
}[/code]

You will see your max stat 2 times mine is 125 as you can see
change it them both to the max stat you want save and compile
this is my first tut on anything so i hope i helped you.

Read full topic
